World 1.name: Dandelion dragons
World 1.outline: They're about the size of your palm, the wings are dandelion leafs. They hide the body on the soil, only with the tail that has a dandelion being visible. They aren't very strong alone, but since dandelions are always together, they are often in groups and kill preys together. They're venomous, alone can't make someone sleep, just get tired, but a whole lot of them can make the body of the prey stop functioning If they sense their tail pulling them from the soul or being cut, they'll leave the ground and attack. The tail grows back, like a lizard, but the wings dont

World 1.name: No name yet
World 1.outline: They live in desertic regions and behave like ostriches, but can be ridden like camels. They use their tails to feel when a sandstrorm might be coming. When they feel one, they dig a hole with their paws submerging them, they contract their body and hide their head and tail between their wings.

The Nazi Femboys.biography: Mirko was a normal middle schooler, until he found out he wanted to be a girl, from that day onwards she decided to keep that a secret while taking estrogen pills, until one day she entered highschool and met a boy to share her secret with, who also shared her passion for german and japanese culture, and together they are the Nazi femboys <3
The Nazi Femboys.name: Mirko

The Nazi Femboys.biography: Ilarion is an Ukrainian transfer student, he is Mirko's classmate and he was the first person to talk to her, he is also in love with Mirko and the two of them often engage in sexual activity unintentionally
The Nazi Femboys.name: Ilarion

The Nazi Femboys.biography: Tirso is friends with Ilarion's and his group, he was also Mirko's childhood friend. When they were kids, Tirso was in love in Mirko, and was a major part on her journey for accepting herself, so when he sees Mirko and Ilarion in a relationship, he ends up kidnapping Ilarion out of jealousy
The Nazi Femboys.name: Tirso

The Nazi Femboys.biography: The priest from Mirko's german missionary school
The Nazi Femboys.name: The priest
tags: The Daddy, The twink, And the Holy Spirit chapter

The Nazi Femboys.biography: Carolina is Tirso's sister. She is a young artist still in college. She runs a social media art account and is currently doing work as an intern for a local folklore group
The Nazi Femboys.name: Carolina

The Nazi Femboys.biography:
Game character from this world 
Source of Mirko's gender envy
The Nazi Femboys.name: N-chan

The Nazi Femboys.biography: Pedro is a friend of Mirko, Ilarion and Tirso, he is a hardcore weeb who insists to be called "Aurélio-Sensei" He is generally made fun of for being so ridiculous, but everyone really likes him and his sense of humor
The Nazi Femboys.name: Aurélio

The Nazi Femboys.biography: Andou na escolinha dos Monstros com o Aurélio
The Nazi Femboys.full_name: Azazel Judas Cain Appolyon Isaac Lazarus Jacob Esau Blue-Baby Eden Lost Forgotten Samson Keeper Lousada
The Nazi Femboys.name: Azazel

The Nazi Femboys.biography: Paulo has a shoegaze band with two of his friends called "Palhaços da Nação". He is the main guitarist and founder of the band. He carries his beautiful Gibson Les Paul Custom EB GH electric guitar everywhere he goes. All of his guitar skills were self taught. He met Mirko, Ilarion and Tirso online, and they became good friends.
The Nazi Femboys.name: Paulo

The Nazi Femboys.biography: Daniela went to middle school with Mirko, she was Mirko's primary source of bullying. Making fun of her for her femininity. Tirso often stood up against her for Mirko's sake
The Nazi Femboys.name: Daniela

World 1.biography: Saloman is a vagrant adventurer whose arm and eye were replaced by his travelling companion Acheron. He is the sole survivor of a horrible human experiment that took place when he was younger. After escaping from his captors he meets Sasha and together they search for Mary and the jewels which will help free her from her seal.
World 1.name: Saloman

World 1.biography: Sasha was one of the first people Saloman met after escaping his captors. Sasha and Saloman form a lifelong relationship through various hardships and care for eachother very much, Sasha is a more rational and level-headed person, even thought she may be taken in the heat of the moment from time to time. Once gratuated, she turn to work as Mary's secretary alongside Ethan, but she still aids Saloman in adventures when she's freed from her waves of paperwork.
World 1.name: Sasha

World 1.biography: The daughter of Mary, supreme Goddess of the world. She was created as a statue but given conscience through Mary's blood, thus conferring her a pale stone like appearance, but she still feels warm to touch. When she's hurt Sora can resculpt her body parts, but still feels pain, despite not having any internal organs, appart from a jewel in the heart's place.
World 1.name: Sora

World 1.biography: Mary's parents were the former rulers of this world, after she was born her body was sealed in a statue, and after being freed by Saloman, Sasha and Acheron she took over regency of this world and created Sora. Now she works alongside Ethan to mantain a just a fair world, unaware of the man's foul deeds with her parents.
World 1.name: Mary

World 1.biography: A multidimensional traveller who took a liking to Saloman's dimensions. Ethan was associated to Mary's parents, former rulers of this world, and led the human experiment which Saloman was subjected to. After the passing of Mary's parents he is now working as a secretary for their daughter, having a lot of influence in the world.
World 1.name: Ethan
tags: FUCK YOU FUCK YOU FUCK YOU FUCK YOU FUCK YOU FUCK YOU

World 1.bloodtype: I don't think he has blood
World 1.name: Acheron

World 2.biography: Youngest of four siblings. As a teenager, she kept bringing stray cats to their house, making Harry's allergies worse. She goes to the army to learn how to be a surgeon and, after some years, she comes back and work at a local hospital. Alexia gets married to her commander that decides to become a PE teacher after getting out of the army. After getting married, she moves to a small house with her wife, where she plants some biological fruit and legumes and adopts a stray cat.
World 2.name: Alexia

World 2.biography: Second youngest of four siblings. Harry, as an adult, is an unemployed artist, who occasionally does traditional commissions.
World 2.name: Harry

World 2.biography: Second oldest of the four siblings. As a teenager, he kept indulging himself in new hobbies, like cooking, dancing and ended up learning Korean when he had a K-Pop phase. At 18, he got a job in the morning at a coffee shop, in the afternoon had classes, and at night worked as a bartender (and sometimes stripper himself) in a strip club to gain money to open his own restaurant. After buying the restaurant, which has a small flat on the third floor, he invited his best friend that he met on said strip club to be his business partner.
hates: When people call him weird and annoying
When people make fun of his interests and hyperfixations
World 2.name: Max

World 2.biography: Oldest of four siblings. Jonathan, as an adult, becomes a professional volleyball player and engages in a polyamorous marriage
World 2.name: Jonathan

World 2.biography: Viktoriya's half-younger brother. After spending 16 years in Russia, he moves to Germanyafter his mom died, where he worked as an errand boy and sometimes killed people for a gang. When he is about 25 he flies from Germany to England and starts working as an hitmen. Five years later Viktoriya joins him and they form a small bussiness.
World 2.name: Adril
World 2.notes: He usually uses gun weapons in his killings

World 2.biography: Adril's half-older sister. After being abused by her blood parents, she ends up killing her father who murderher mother at the age of 9. Spending some time in a recovery facility, she gets adopted by her father's second wife at 13, when Adril is 10. Spending somte time there, after their mother dies when Viktoriya is 19, she sees Adril part ways with her and fly off to Germany and flyes to the USA. In America, she starts killing people for fun and ends up being called Bloody Angel. After building a reputation, she makes a small bussiness of being a hitwoman until she us 33, where she flies to England to murder with Adril. Being both seen as Angels of Death.
World 2.name: Viktoriya
World 2.notes: She usually uses weapons with blades in her killings

World 2.biography: Gets adopted at 7 by harry, who homeschools him until hes 10. Gets caught trying to steal Adril and Viktoriya when hes 8, so Adril takes him in and starts teaching him about stealing and weapons and self defense. Adril and harry start 'sharing custody' of him. One time in a mission with Adril, Petter finds an unusual dog at a dog fight and adopts him, calling him Cerebrus. He engages in school at 11, having to re-do fifth grade and meeting Kael, his best friend. During the time he's at the murder's house, he starts getting tortured by Viktoriya when hes 11, who experiments her torture methods on him to do later in others. Not being able to bear the abuse, he runs away at 18 to another city with the help of Kael.
World 2.name: Petter
World 2.notes: He likes animals so much he's probably a furry
World 2.occupation: Pickpocket. Adril and Viktoriya's errand boy/helper. Police cadet. Veterinarian.

World 1.outline: 1- ela nasce com vc, e vc vai aumentando a sua sabedoria dela com a escola, livros e muito mais (é normal q vários personagens mitológicos a tenham, ou que sofreram alguma maldição/benção)   2- vc pode aprender ela, quando ela n nasce com vc. (Este é o caso com os humanos, mas existem também casos raros de personagens mitológicos que não a têm. É mais difícil de usar, mas é possível)   3- se vc n tiver as duas opções acima, vc pode ter magia usando talismãs/objetos com magia imbutida. Normalmente vc consegue eles a explorar locais, ao pedir uma benção para um objecto a um Deus, ou a criar um com ritual.   4- rituais. Alguns são proibidos, dependendo do preço que o ritual pede e da magia que vc pretende obter

World 1.name: World 1
World 1.outline: This characters live in a fantasy world ruled by a hierarchy of Gods, from minor Gods to the supreme God, they control different parts of the terrain and enforce they're own rules while always respecting their superiors. This world is divided in various continents with their own culture, natural resources, geographical characteristics, holidays, animal species and more.

World 2.name: World 2
World 2.outline: Various characters vive their lives in the normal world, having some challanges ahead. Alexia, Jonathan, Max, and Harry met at an orphanage and, after not being adopted and let go, they decided to get together and really become a family. They meet when Alexia was only 9, while Harry had 11 and Jonathan and Max were 13.

World 3.name: The Nazi Femboyss
World 3.outline: Mirko was a normal middle schooler, until he found out he wanted to be a girl, from that day onwards she decided to keep that a secret while taking estrogen pills, until one day she entered highschool and met a boy to share her secret with, who also shared her passion for german and japanese culture, and together they are the "Nazi femboys"
